devdoc.details: Main contract for creating and managing AdSlot contracts

batchWithdrawAdSlotFees(address[]).details: Processes fee withdrawal from multiple ad slots

constructor.details: Initializes contract with deployer as owner and records deployment block

getAdSlotInfo(address).details: Returns information about specified ad slot

getCurrentBidInfo(address).details: Returns information about current bid on specified ad slot

placeBid(address,string).details: Processes new bid placement with validation

transferOwnership(address).details: Processes controller ownership transfer with validation

withdrawAdSlotFees(address).details: Processes fee withdrawal from ad slot

devdoc.title: AdSlotController Implementation

AdSlotCreated(address,string,string,uint.notice: Required state variables: address payable public _owner; mapping(address => AdSlotInfo) public _adSlots; AdSlotInfo[] private _adSlotAddresses; uint256 public immutable i_deploymentBlock;

_adSlots(address).notice: Returns information about the specified ad slot

i_deploymentBlock().notice: Returns the contract deployment block number

userdoc.notice: Implements centralized management of multiple advertisement slots
